phrases: I have gathered you all here for one reason.
At this point we shall now commence Operation High Tension Syndrome.
This is the first time I have heard of this operation.
I only recently came up with it.
Yurippe, what kind of operation is it?
For one day, you will conduct everything at high tension.
Everything you do will be at high tension.
When moving between classes, a full - speed sprint.
When talking to each other, yelling.
And do not forget to smile!
You will conduct everything at high tension.
We act as though we are spending a fulfilled school life.
If we live a fulfilled life, we will disappear.
If we do as the operation says, we will be faking high tension all day, like we have gone mad.
That is almost like a punishment game!
To us, it is a painful task.
She will be stuck wondering why we are not reincarnating, despite living such fulfilled school lives.
How do you think Angel will respond then?
We will be living happy school lives.
That is a condition for reincarnation.
What on earth is going on?!
She will be confused by this unprecedented irregularity.
And then she will attempt to make contact.
She will report that an anomaly is occurring in this world!
If we follow just her, she will lead us right to him!
That is quite a plan, but how long do we have to keep it up?
We will commence the operation at 9 am today.
The operation will end at 9 pm.
We just have to be at high tension in front of Angel, right?
We do not know when she is watching.
We have to stay at high tension for 12 hours straight?!
You all fast for a week.
To run against my character this far... what an operation!
Oh, and I am in charge of observing Angel, so I will not be joining you.
Do I have to do this too?
How can it be so good?!
A cute girl is inviting you!
I might be lucky, but unfortunately...
I am going to be playing catch with Otonashi!!
It is got to be men playing catch together!!
Then I will be practicing with GirlDeMo!!
Go sing a love song or something!
I will write and sing the best love song ever!!
It is fun just thinking about it!
I am saying that if you have got two people throwing, it is even more fun with a guy hitting!!
I did not think of that!
That is why I want to join!
Then will not it be better with an outfield?!
You are already ready for this!!
I have built this muscle solely to play baseball!!
This is going to be damn fun!!
Let us head to the grounds!!
If you are up for eating, then let us eat out the whole dining hall!!
I have no clue what you are saying, but okay let us go!!
What, you are not here anymore?!
Let us head to the dining hall!
My stomach's ready for some action!!
This omelette rice is the best!!
This dining hall is all about the udon!
I got to lick the plate clean!!
I am getting me seconds too!
It is going to be so fun, I cannot stop shaking!
This muscle was made for it!
What are you going to do now?
That is what youth is all about!!
But this is no time to be taken aback!
Studying is also a part of youth!!
I have built this muscle solely to study!!
Ii Naosuke, Tairou of the Edo Bakufu
Ii Naosuke is like a superhero to me!
When do we get to the Incident at Honnouji?!
It is time for the Shorui Awaremi no Rei, Sensei!!
It is time for the Shorui Awaremi no Rei now!
What are you, Soga no Iruka?!
Because we are doing Japanese history, right?
Leave him be and keep going!
Alright, now let us go to the next page.
During the French Revolution, as symbols of the privileged class, Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette
Marie is a moe heroine in my book, so I accidentally came!
When will Watt's steam engine be invented?!
No, the steam - powered locomotive was not
It is time for the Second Punic War, Sensei!!
There was not a Bakufu called that...
Because we are doing world history, right?
It is time for some real baseball!!
Let us free ourselves from worldly thoughts with cleaning!!
But real men do not use wimpy cleaning tools!
They use only a dust cloth!!
It is a dust cloth battle!!
I built this body solely to use a dust cloth!!
It is time to unleash my full power!!
They are making it harder on themselves...
Um... they have always been like this.
There is still the second floor!!
My body has just warmed up!!
They actually look like they are having fun.
Do not you feel like spittin' out a hella awesome rap song?!
Just cannot get enough of those lines!!
I am a woman of this turf.
You can walk your own way.
So she will take care of all of Osaka by herself?
We are in the middle of Operation High Tension!
If it fails, everyone fasts for a week.
Does not that Naniwa couple just rack your brain?!
I am crying from that love song, damn!!
Hisako - senpai's killer bass and line were genius too!!
You are picking a fight, are not you...
Then how about we head out there and hold an outdoor live?!
You think we will hold out a full week like this?
Yurippe's fasting means no water either.
Let us do some exercise for digestion!
Why do not we learn how to dance from TK?!
Teach us how to dance now!
We need a wide open area!
Let us head to the grounds!
Everyone is out here for it, yeah!!
Let us burn out the night!!
We are going to play baseball here right now!
Hitting, fielding, running, safe, all that!!
A band is more youthful than baseball, dammit!!
You stupid baseball - baseball - I - love - baseball freak!!
Dancing together will make us all happier!
You are so full, must be happy!
Turning this place into a dancing ground will make us all happier!
Dan, we need to talk now, happy boy!!
It is an outdoor live, dammit!!
What kind of idiot are you?!
Whoever enjoys dancing the most must be so happy!
You are saying balls and caps do not give you a better thrill?!
Then why not just have a sports festival?!
We can just have a sports festival.
All the normal students are already here.
The only thing we can do with this many people is a sports festival.
I built this body solely for sports festivals!!
Things are getting very exciting out here.
I wonder how things are with Angel?
The hell are you making me do?!
You are putting on some high tension yourself, huh...
Tenshi is currently talking in the student council room.
I think it will end soon.
1000 points to whoever wins this cavalry battle!!
We are going to turn the tables with this!!
Hey, that team there is kind of scary.
I will stand out more than anyone and get more headbands than anyone!
Angel must be watching this from the student council room and getting more and more confused.
Why are not they disappearing, despite how fulfilled they look?
Thank you for the high tension interruption.
We are in the middle of a meeting!
Right into the worst possible situation?!
And how are you guys so weak?!
But she said she was going to explain something.
Having so many normal students down like this is an unprecedented irregularity.
The Battlefront always made sure the NPCs were unaffected by their activities.
But this time it is different.
Regardless of whether the operation was a success, we are dealing with the Battlefront's very objective here.
There is an entrance to a basement here?
Is this... the path to God?
The security here is as tight as Guild.
There is no doubt about it.
If you do not make it, we leave you behind!
Now that I have suddenly left the student council behind in the middle of a meeting to check on these cute turnips...
that I had been raising for the Gardening Club after they collapsed when I remembered about them after I heard the word cute...
How should I explain that to them?
What was with the security out there?!
Who would have thought the door would just open at the push of a button?
You were just dialing it on the keypad!
I was just calculating the remaining funds for the Gardening Club.
Starting right now, the Afterlife Battlefront...
I have worked hard to get this far in memory of you, but...
The GirlDeMo members are all down.
Well, it is not like they will die.
You do make the best villain after all, Yurippe - san.
mezamete wa kurikaesu nemuri asa wa
eri no tai wo kitsuku shime
honno sukoshi mune wo hatte arukidaseru
furuedasu i am about to kono mune de
iku oku no hoshi ga kie satteku no wo
miokutta te wo futta yokatta ne to
I open my eyes again, to a sleepy morning
I tighten the tie around my neck
When I pass through the door of the classroom
I puff my chest out with a little bit of pride
A wind that blows past everyday life
It started to shake within my chest
I felt it would come now
I watched countless stars as they vanished
I waved goodbye, I am glad
itsuka hito wa hitori ni natte
omoide no naka ni ikiteku dake
kodoku sae aishi waratterareru you ni
When I turn around, everyone is far behind
I am not afraid of anything anymore,
I try to whisper to myself
They live on only in memories
So I can laugh with my heart, even in this loneliness
Classroom Block A Student Council Room Front
